questions.questionTitle: Why does the woman call the man?
What problem does the woman have?
anwers: She has run out of money.

questions.questionTitle: What will the man probably do next?
anwers: Send the woman a check for $150.
Tell the woman to call back later.
Offer the woman a job at the bank.

script:
� United Mutual Bank. Marco speaking.
� Hi, I'm calling to ask about a check I deposited last week for $150. I looked online, and it does not show up in my account.
� OK, I'll have to check on that. Can I have your name and account number, please?
� It's Wendy Wilson. My account number is 161-453-2729.
